categories.name: Protein Shakes

categories.name: Teas

menuItems.name: Chocolate Protein Shake
menuItems.description: Rich chocolate protein shake made with premium whey protein, almond milk, and natural cocoa. Perfect for post-workout recovery.

menuItems.name: Vanilla Protein Shake
menuItems.description: Smooth vanilla protein shake with clean ingredients. Made with grass-fed whey protein and organic vanilla extract.

menuItems.name: Strawberry Protein Shake
menuItems.description: Fresh strawberry protein shake with real fruit and premium protein. Sweet, refreshing, and packed with nutrients.

menuItems.name: Green Tea
menuItems.description: Premium organic green tea with antioxidants. Light, refreshing, and perfect for hydration during workouts.

menuItems.name: Chai Tea
menuItems.description: Spiced chai tea with warming cinnamon, ginger, and cardamom. Served with your choice of milk.

menuItems.name: Herbal Tea Blend
menuItems.description: Custom herbal blend with chamomile, peppermint, and lavender. Calming and perfect for post-workout relaxation.

menuItems.name: Protein Waffle
menuItems.description: Fluffy protein waffle made with whey protein and whole grain flour. Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside.

menuItems.name: Banana Protein Waffle
menuItems.description: Delicious banana protein waffle with real banana and cinnamon. Naturally sweetened and packed with potassium.

menuItems.name: Blueberry Protein Waffle
menuItems.description: Fresh blueberry protein waffle bursting with antioxidants. Made with real blueberries and premium protein powder.

menuItems.name: Classic Acai Bowl
menuItems.description: Traditional acai bowl with granola, banana, and honey. Rich in antioxidants and perfect for pre-workout energy.

menuItems.name: Tropical Acai Bowl
menuItems.description: Tropical acai bowl with mango, pineapple, and coconut. Refreshing and packed with vitamin C and electrolytes.

menuItems.name: Protein Acai Bowl
menuItems.description: High-protein acai bowl with added whey protein, almonds, and Greek yogurt. Perfect for post-workout recovery.
